node.title: The Physiology of Worship
node.description: This seminar will help attendees understand why we are sick, what the Bible says about it, and how our worship effects our physiology. Dr. Marcum will share concepts from his recently released seven-week Bible study entitled "Biblical Prescriptions for Life," which offers a biblical approach to improving health and prioritizes a restorative relationship with Christ. Join Dr. Marcum on this journey following Christ's example of caring for physical needs and pointing the sick towards the Father.
